Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Herd Baloth, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [mh2] Territorial Kavu
item.description:
Creature — Kavu

Domain — Territorial Kavu's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.

Whenever Territorial Kavu attacks, choose one —

• Discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

• Exile up to one target card from a graveyard.

https://articles.starcitygames.com/select/lessons-learned-in-play-design-and-previewing-territorial-kavu/

item.title: [mh2] Dermotaxi
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Imprint — As Dermotaxi enters the battlefield, exile a creature card from a graveyard.

Tap two untapped creatures you control: Until end of turn, Dermotaxi becomes a copy of the imprinted card, except it's a Vehicle artifact in addition to its other types.

https://twitter.com/brent_vos_/status/1397960796856930306

item.title: [mh2] Out of Time
item.description:
Enchantment

When Out of Time enters the battlefield, untap all creatures, then phase them out until Out of Time leaves the battlefield. Put a time counter on Out of Time for each creature phased out this way.

Vanishing

item.title: [mh2] Constable of the Realm
item.description:
Creature — Giant Soldier

Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Constable of the Realm, exile up to one other target nonland permanent until Constable of the Realm leaves the battlefield.

item.description:

Creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

item.description:

Flying, lifelink

When Piru dies, it deals 7 damage to each nonlegendary creature.

item.title: [mh2] Breya's Apprentice
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Human Artificer

When Breya's Apprentice enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Choose one —

• Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

• Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/LordofIronforge/status/1398001155108659202

item.title: [mh2] Sanctuary Raptor
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Bird

Flying

Whenever Sanctuary Raptor attacks, if you control three or more tokens, Sanctuary Raptor gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/LordofIronforge/status/1398001155108659202

item.title: [mh2] "Prophetic Hulk"
item.description:
Creature — Giant Wizard

Delirium — When "Prophetic Hulk" enters the battlefield, choose one. If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, choose both.

• "Prophetic Hulk" deals 4 damage to any target.

• Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one in your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://twitter.com/migucheras/status/1398010297399586817

item.title: [mh2] Obsidian Charmaw
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each land your opponents control that could produce {C}.

Flying

WHen Obsidian Charmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonbasic land an opponent control.s

item.title: [mh2] Calibrated Blast
item.description:
Instant

Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. When you reveal a nonland card this way, Calibrated Blast deals damage equal to that card's mana value to any target.

Flashback {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mh2] Arcboud Whelp
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Dragon

Flying

{R}: Arcboud Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

item.title: [mh2] Ignoble Hierarch
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

{T}: add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d8c4iOjMMAA

item.title: [mh2] Lonis, Cryptozoologist
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Snake Elf Scout

Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, investigate.

{T}, Sacrifice X clues: Target opponent reveals the top X cards of their library. You may put a nonland permanent card with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield under your control. That player puts the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order.

https://twitter.com/DeejayKnight/status/1397722173557678081

item.title: [mh2] Dragon's Rage Channeler
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

Delirium — As long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Dragon's Rage Channeler gets +2/+2, has flying, and attacks each combat if able.

https://www.mtgcast.com/podcasts/the-third-power/posts/the-third-power-episode-82-dragon-s-rage-channeler-our-exclusive-preview-for-modern-horizons-2-1f827c244c

item.title: [mh2] "Hmm, Don't Like That!!"
item.description:
Creature — Vedalken Rogue

"Hmm, Don't Like That!!" can't be blocked.

Metalcraft — "Hmm, Don't Like That!!" gets +1/+0 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

item.title: [rmh1] The First Sliver
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Sliver

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Sliver spells you cast have cascade.
